description: Many pundits see Britain's official departure from the EU as diminishing both parties.
title: Brexit: Sadness and relief - European papers' view
title_page: Brexit: Sadness and relief - European papers' view - BBC News
maintext: There are calls for greater self-reflection within the EU. "When will Brussels start the inquiry into its own share in this divorce?" asks a commentator for the Dutch financial channel RTLZ. "It would be better if Brussels finally looked at itself in the mirror and started wondering about what aversion the British - and too many other Europeans - are experiencing."
